alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:43AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Butler, central Monroe, southern Crenshaw, eastern Escambia, Conecuh, Covington and northern Okaloosa Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 442 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brantley to 3 miles east of Repton. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andalusia, Opp, Evergreen, Florala, Brantley, McKenzie, River Falls, Castleberry, Red Level, Laurel Hill, Lockhart, Dozier, Repton, Heath, Gantt, Glenwood and I65 And US 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
